sizes_available: Sample shown is 140cm folded and 33cm deep. Full wingspan unfolded is 280cm.
suggested_yarn: Hedgehog Fibres Oh So Fine Soufflé
full_text: Lightweight and generously sized, this hooded scarf is knitted in garter stitch with a fun zig zag edge and a built in i-cord. The Soufflé yarn is so soft and fluffy, an absolute delight to knit with and to wear. The scarf is knitted flat and the hood is seamed at the end. Yarn: 2 skeins Hedgehog Fibres Oh So Fine Soufflé (100% Merino, 300m/100g), colourway pictured is Desert Rose.
name: Ravelry: Faefolk Hood pattern by Beata Jezek
